hadith.text: It was narrated from Muhammad bin Sirin that Umm 'Atiyyah Al-Ansariyyah said:"The Messenger of Allah entered upon us when his daughter died, and said: 'Wash her three times or five, or more if you think (that is needed), with water and lote leaves, and put some camphor in it the last time, and when you have finished call me.' When we finished we called him and he gave us his waist-wrap, and said: 'Shroud her in it
